content: Banshee Listening Lai In the dead of nightA banshee takes flightWailingAt the dreadful plightOf a drowning wrightFlailing;This hag’s keening mightHas our bravest knightQuailing Abby O. Akoto for Poetry in Form.
title: Banshee
